meta.job_title: Senior Director, Time Away From Work

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the reimagination of the time away from work associate experience

Evaluate and create opportunities to streamline processes, policies, and procedures to build a world class time away from work delivery function, putting the associate at the center of all interactions
Build relationships with key internal stakeholders (payroll, HRIS, IT, etc) to proactively partner on issues and projects

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience required. 10+ years of benefits/time-away-from-work administration experience. 5+ years of management experience of multiple team members to strong results preferred. Experience with leave management systems preferred.
